Identification_Area.title: Mars 2020 RIMFAX Calibrated Data Product rimfax_rdr_0081

Observing_System_Component.name: Radar Imager for Mars Subsurface Exploration

Header.description: The first line in the file contains column headings.

Field_Delimited.name: record_type
Field_Delimited.description: Type of data record: 0 = Active Sounding Measurement, 1 = Passive Radiometry Measurement, 5 = Housekeeping Measurement, 8 = Calibration Array

Field_Delimited.name: utc
Field_Delimited.description: Universal Time Coordinated

Field_Delimited.name: jdate
Field_Delimited.description: Julian date

Field_Delimited.name: year
Field_Delimited.description: Earth year

Field_Delimited.name: doy
Field_Delimited.description: Day of Earth year

Field_Delimited.name: mars_year
Field_Delimited.description: Mars year, measured from [April 11, 1955 = start of Year 1 OR May 24, 1953 = start of Year 0]

Field_Delimited.name: m2020_sol
Field_Delimited.description: Sol of the Mars 2020 Perseverance mission

Field_Delimited.name: ls
Field_Delimited.description: Solar longitude, measured from northern spring equinox = 0

Field_Delimited.name: soltime_mean
Field_Delimited.description: Local mean solar time

Field_Delimited.name: soltime_true
Field_Delimited.description: Local true solar time

Field_Delimited.name: sclk
Field_Delimited.description: System time in SCLK seconds, measured from [Time 0=midnight on 1-Jan-1980]

Field_Delimited.name: sclk_sub_ns
Field_Delimited.description: System time SCLK subseconds, in whole-number of nanoseconds

Field_Delimited.name: sun_lat
Field_Delimited.description: Sub-solar latitude

Field_Delimited.name: sun_lon
Field_Delimited.description: Sub-solar longitude

Field_Delimited.name: sun_dist
Field_Delimited.description: Distance to Sun

Field_Delimited.name: sun_inc
Field_Delimited.description: Sun incidence angle, relative to ellipsoid, measured from planetary zenith = 0

Field_Delimited.name: sun_az
Field_Delimited.description: Sun azimuth direction, measured clockwise from North = 0

Field_Delimited.name: ant_lat
Field_Delimited.description: [Planetocentric] Latitude of center of antenna

Field_Delimited.name: ant_lon
Field_Delimited.description: [East] Longitude of center of antenna

Field_Delimited.name: ant_elev
Field_Delimited.description: [Planetary] Elevation of center of antenna

Field_Delimited.name: ant_az
Field_Delimited.description: Azimuth direction of antenna, measured from North = 0. Increasing positive angle = clockwise/right-hand rotation around gravity vector from center of rover to ground (ie, positive azimuth angle means rover is pointed east of North).

Field_Delimited.name: ant_pitch
Field_Delimited.description: Pitch angle of antenna, relative to local ellipsoid surface / gravity-normal plane, measured from horizontal = 0. Increasing positive angle = clockwise/right-hand rotation around axis from center through right side of rover (ie, positive pitch angle means front of rover is higher than back of rover).

Field_Delimited.name: ant_roll
Field_Delimited.description: Roll angle of antenna, relative to local ellipsoid surface / gravity-normal plane, measured from horizontal = 0. Increasing positive angle = clockwise/right-hand rotation around axis from center through front of rover (ie, positive roll angle means right side of rover is lower than left side of rover).

Field_Delimited.name: ant_tilt
Field_Delimited.description: Tilt angle of antenna in direction of maximum tilt, relative to local ellipsoid surface / gravity-normal plane, measured from horizontal = 0.

Field_Delimited.name: ant_tiltaz
Field_Delimited.description: Azimuth direction of maximum antenna tilt, measured clockwise from North = 0.

Field_Delimited.name: rover_lat
Field_Delimited.description: [Planetocentric] Latitude of center of rover

Field_Delimited.name: rover_lon
Field_Delimited.description: [East] Longitude of center of rover

Field_Delimited.name: rover_elev
Field_Delimited.description: [Planetary] Elevation of center of rover

Field_Delimited.name: rover_sapp_quality
Field_Delimited.description: Attitude quality flag: list possibilities for VALUE=MEANING

Field_Delimited.name: rover_left_bogie
Field_Delimited.description: Angle of left bogie joint

Field_Delimited.name: rover_right_bogie
Field_Delimited.description: Angle of right bogie joint

Field_Delimited.name: rover_left_differential
Field_Delimited.description: Angle of left differential joint

Field_Delimited.name: rover_right_differential
Field_Delimited.description: Angle of right differential joint

Field_Delimited.name: rover_steer_lf
Field_Delimited.description: Steer angle of left-front wheel

Field_Delimited.name: rover_steer_lr
Field_Delimited.description: Steer angle of left-rear wheel

Field_Delimited.name: rover_steer_rf
Field_Delimited.description: Steer angle of right-front wheel

Field_Delimited.name: rover_steer_rr
Field_Delimited.description: Steer angle of right-rear wheel

Field_Delimited.name: system_rmc_site
Field_Delimited.description: Site rover motion counter (RMC 1)

Field_Delimited.name: system_rmc_drive
Field_Delimited.description: Drive rover motion counter (RMC 2)

Field_Delimited.name: system_rmc_pose
Field_Delimited.description: Pose rover motion counter (RMC 3)

Field_Delimited.name: system_rmc_arm
Field_Delimited.description: Arm rover motion counter (RMC 4)

Field_Delimited.name: system_rmc_sha
Field_Delimited.description: SHA rover motion counter (RMC 5)

Field_Delimited.name: system_rmc_drill
Field_Delimited.description: Drill rover motion counter (RMC 6)

Field_Delimited.name: system_rmc_rsm
Field_Delimited.description: RSM rover motion counter (RMC 7)

Field_Delimited.name: system_rmc_hga
Field_Delimited.description: HGA rover motion counter (RMC 8)

Field_Delimited.name: source_product_id
Field_Delimited.description: Identifier name of EDR product containing this measurement

Field_Delimited.name: config
Field_Delimited.description: Identifier of current Rimfax configuration mode

Field_Delimited.name: electronics_temp
Field_Delimited.description: Temperature derived from Term_RF1 and Term_RF1

Field_Delimited.name: avg_temp
Field_Delimited.description: Temperature of VAMP UHFA/RMFX Base, 10-second average

Field_Delimited.name: config_id
Field_Delimited.description: Identifier of current Rimfax configuration mode

Field_Delimited.name: mode_name
Field_Delimited.description: General name or type of the sounding mode/configuration, possibly with a qualifier

Field_Delimited.name: activity_name
Field_Delimited.description: Name of Rimfax Activity as defined in Activity Dictionary (and used in COCPIT, etc)

Field_Delimited.name: calibration_cable
Field_Delimited.description: 1 = Generated signal sent to Calibration Cable, 0 = Generated signal sent to Antenna (or radar measurement is Passive, ie "receive_only = 1)

Field_Delimited.name: traverse
Field_Delimited.description: 1 = Sounding is part of a Traverse set, 0 = Sounding is Stationary (or radar measurement is Passive, ie "receive_only = 1)

Field_Delimited.name: lis
Field_Delimited.description: 1 = Long Integration Sounding (LIS, with bit growth), 0 = regular sounding (or radar measurement is Passive, ie "receive_only = 1)

Field_Delimited.name: sweep_gate_frequency
Field_Delimited.description: Frequency of the gate signal

Field_Delimited.name: sweep_time
Field_Delimited.description: Duration of radar signal generation sweep through full frequency bandwidth (given by sweep_start_frequency and sweep_stop_frequency), for Active Meas; duration of listening period, for Passive Meas

Field_Delimited.name: sweep_start_frequency
Field_Delimited.description: Start frequency of the radar bandwidth sweep, for Active Meas; Start frequency of the radar listening range, for Passive Meas

Field_Delimited.name: sweep_stop_frequency
Field_Delimited.description: Stop frequency of the radar bandwidth sweep, for Active Meas; Stop frequency of the radar listening range, for Passive Meas

Field_Delimited.name: sample_frequency_interval
Field_Delimited.description: Frequency interval covered by each recorded sample

Field_Delimited.name: number_of_frequency_samples
Field_Delimited.description: Number of frequency-domain samples recorded

Field_Delimited.name: number_of_sweeps_per_sounding
Field_Delimited.description: Number of radar bandwidth sweeps integrated and recorded in one sounding

Field_Delimited.name: tx_delay
Field_Delimited.description: Time delay of transmitter gate

Field_Delimited.name: tx_attenuation
Field_Delimited.description: Attenuation in the trasmit path, higher value represents lower output power

Field_Delimited.name: rx_delay
Field_Delimited.description: Time delay of receiver gate

Field_Delimited.name: rx_attenuation
Field_Delimited.description: Attenuation in the receive path, higher value represents more dampening of the received signal

Field_Delimited.name: sounding_group_spacing
Field_Delimited.description: Distance between sounding groups (collections of one or more soundings as given by the activity definition)

Field_Delimited.name: sounding_counter
Field_Delimited.description: Absolute total count of soundings since start of mission

Field_Delimited.name: sounding_number
Field_Delimited.description: Count of soundings since last RIMFAX Power-On

Field_Delimited.name: sounding_number_sol
Field_Delimited.description: Count of soundings since start of Sol

Field_Delimited.name: calibration_array_ref_object
Field_Delimited.description: Integer Label of the Calibration Array contained in data sample/array element columns (at end of table) = Object of Reference Integer in any of 3 Parameters with suffix "_ref

Field_Delimited.name: amplitude_correction_ref
Field_Delimited.description: Reference to Amplitude_Correction_Array given in label file, applied in the frequency domain (1D array, length = number_of_samples_frequency)

Field_Delimited.name: phase_correction_ref
Field_Delimited.description: Reference to Phase_Correction_Array given in label file, applied in the frequency domain(1D array, length = number_of_samples_frequency)

Field_Delimited.name: gating_amplitude_correction_ref
Field_Delimited.description: Reference to Gating_Amplitude_Correction_Array given in label file, applied in the time domain (1D array, length = number_of_samples_time)

Field_Delimited.name: radiometric_correction_factor
Field_Delimited.description: Multiplicative factor by which values are radiometrically calibrated to be the ratio of returned signal amplitude/power to radiated signal amplitude/power, applied in the time domain

Field_Delimited.name: time_zero_correction
Field_Delimited.description: Change in reference time delay from EDR version to this RDR version, applied in the time domain (ie, setting of "t=0" in RDR data to antenna center/feed point)

Field_Delimited.name: window_function_type
Field_Delimited.description: Window function name, applied in the frequency domain

Field_Delimited.name: zero_padding_factor
Field_Delimited.description: Multiplicative factor by which number of frequency samples is increased before Fourier transform, aapplied in the frequency domain (new sample values all = 0)

Field_Delimited.name: max_time_depth
Field_Delimited.description: Maximum time-depth range of sounding (ie, end time of last data sample for Active Meas)

Field_Delimited.name: sample_time_increment
Field_Delimited.description: Time increment of each processed data sample, for Active Meas

Field_Delimited.name: sample_frequency_increment
Field_Delimited.description: Frequency increment of each processed data sample, for Passive Meas

Field_Delimited.name: n_samples_time
Field_Delimited.description: Number of processed data samples in following columns, for Active Meas

Field_Delimited.name: n_samples_frequency
Field_Delimited.description: Number of processed data samples in following columns, for Passive Meas

Field_Delimited.name: n_samples_calarray
Field_Delimited.description: Number of samples in following columns, for Calibration Arrays (only in first few data-table records)

Field_Delimited.name: n_samples
Field_Delimited.description: Number of samples in following columns - will be equal to "n_samples_time" for Active Meas, or "n_samples_frequency" for Passive Meas, or "n_samples_calarray" for Calibration Array, or = 0 for HK Meas

Field_Delimited.name: sounding_samples
Field_Delimited.description: Sounding Samples
